name: get_products_in_category
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool demo_project_v3.
Tool description: This Project is created by the onboarding process
API description: Fetches products from a specified category using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

skip.description: The number of products to skip before starting to collect the result set.

limit.description: The maximum number of products to retrieve.

category.description: The category of products to fetch.
